File /std/shops/inherit/newspaper_archive.c

This is the newspaper archive inherit. Allows you to buy back issues of the paper.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Wed May 23 15:56:13 PDT 2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/shops/inherit/shop_event.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/move_failures.h, /include/shops/bank.h, /include/shops/newspaper_archive.h, /include/room/newspaper.h and /include/money.h

Method index

do_buy(string, int)
This method buys a back issue of the paper.
do_list_papers()
This method shows which papers are currently available for buying back issues of.
query_paper()
This method returns the paper for use in getting information form the archive.
query_paper_area()
This method returns the paper area for use in getting information form the archive.
set_paper(string)
This sets the paper to use for getting information from the archive.
set_paper_area(string)
This sets the paper area to use for getting information from the archive.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
do_buy
int do_buy(string paper,
int edition)
This method buys a back issue of the paper.

Parameters:
paper - the paper to buy a back issue of
issue - the issue number to buy
